DOC.brief_summary: - CpG has the potential to stimulate the immune system - this study will evaluate the safety of CpG given sub-q or IV - purpose is to measure biological changes in CLL cells after receiving CpG
DOC.brief_title: A Dose Finding Study of CpG in Patients With Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia Who Have Been Previously Treated
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of CLL CLL previously treated Hemoglobin >/= 10 Platelets >/= 50,000 Neutrophils >= 1,000 patients with brain mets patients with autoimmune disease patients on corticosteroids or immunosuppressants patients with uncontrolled intercurrent illness pregnant women HIV patients receiving combination antiretroviral therapy
